item.label: Reseller Program intro
item.description: This is a great introduction to the reseller program and covers all the basics

item.label: Manage users
item.description: Manage multiple users and also learn how to launch the SignageStudio directly as a sub user

item.label: Manage Businesses
item.description: Manage your customers; create new accounts and associate existing customers as sub accounts of your reseller studio

item.label: Multi user support
item.description: Learn about multiple concurrent user support; synchronize data between active users and resolve data conflicts

item.label: Managed Privileges
item.description: Set privileges and manage what users can and cannot access within the SignageStudio

item.label: Access keys
item.description: Create specific rules using access control lists on which resources your users can work on

item.label: White Label / Branding
item.description: Learn how to brand your own digital signage product and white label the solution thus making it your own directly off your web site
